sentences.cn: 他发表了很有说服力的论点.

sentences.en: His arguments in favour of a new school are very persuasive.
sentences.cn: 他赞成办一座新学校的理由很有说服力.

sentences.en: I can be very persuasive when I want to be.
sentences.cn: 如果我愿意的话，我会非常有说服力的。

sentences.en: In either case it is persuasive because there is somebody whom it persuades.
sentences.cn: 不管在那种情况下，它之所以有说服力，是因为有人被说服了。

sentences.en: In his graft way, he was very persuasive.
sentences.cn: 他虽然态度生硬, 但很有说服力.

sentences.en: Michael Grade's persuasive powers overcame their objections.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔·格雷德能言善辩，驳倒了他们的反对意见。

sentences.en: Providing examples of what others are saying about your suitability and skills is extremely persuasive and the more you have, the more your influence rises.
sentences.cn: 举例说明别人对你的适合性和技能的评价十分有说服力，这样的例子越多，你的影响力增长的就越大。

sentences.en: She oiled her words in order to sound persuasive.
sentences.cn: 她使用花言巧语使话有说服力.

sentences.en: She went on with persuasive smoothness.
sentences.cn: 她用一种圆滑而娓娓动听的语调继续说下去.

sentences.en: The evidence was not really persuasive enough.
sentences.cn: 证据并不是太有说服力.

sentences.en: The mathematical formulation of this hypothesis is a persuasive one.
sentences.cn: 这一假设的数学形式是诱人的.

sentences.en: The night was soft and persuasive.
sentences.cn: 轻柔的夜晚具有诱人的魅力.

sentences.en: The salesman has a persuasive way of talking.
sentences.cn: 那推销员有一种能说服人的谈话方式.

sentences.en: The writer aerateed his writing with a persuasive colloquialism.
sentences.cn: 作者用一种有说服力的口语体使他的文章显得生动.
特雷弗有时很会说服人。

sentences.en: We should at least be finding persuasive new ways.
sentences.cn: 我们至少应该找出能说服人的新办法来.

sentences.en: What do you think were some of the more persuasive arguments on the other side?
sentences.cn: 你认为对方哪些观点更有说服力？

words.tran_cn: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的

trans.tran_cn: 有说服力的，劝诱的，动听
trans.tran_en: able to make other people believe something or do what you ask
